emuInput.TitMainTitle: P. L. Prattis wearing Arabian clothing after tour of Middle East, standing in domestic interior with concave mirror and floral curtains
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 25, 1954, pg. 8, reads: "Where Jesus Walked - Percival L. Prattis, Courier executive editor, addressed the Wesley Center morning congregation Sunday, Dec. 19, with a message bearing the impact of his recent study tour of the Holy Lands. The speaker was one of a group of editors and writers who toured Middle Eastern Countries during the month of November through the courtesy of the American Christian Palestine Committee. In colorful native Arabian attire, he impressed fellow church members with a vivid and enlightening account of conditions in the Arab states."
